items.name: ALL
desc: The page style is identically used for left and right pages.

items.name: LEFT
desc: set the horizontal alignment to the left margin from the container object
The text range is left-aligned between the previous tabulator (or the left border, if none) and this tabulator.
The page style is only used for left pages.

items.name: MIRRORED
desc: The page style is used unchanged for left pages and mirrored for right pages.

items.name: RIGHT
desc: set the horizontal alignment to the right margin from the container object
The text range is right-aligned between the previous tabulator (or the left border, if none) and this tabulator.
The page style is only used for right pages.
